name: D.Gray-man: Kami no Shitotachi
overview: It features a retelling of Allen’s first missions after joining the Black Order, from Mater to Krory’s Castle. Players may pick their choice of companions as they solve puzzles and battle Akuma in a race to reach the Innocence before the Millennium Earl. The final chapter, a non-canonical story set in Cagliostro, contains three possible endings.
